title: Bug 87282Compilation error on generic member introduction
description: Bug 87282Compilation error on generic member introduction
OB: The compiler aborts with the following introduction code:aspect introductionToA{private ArrayList<B A.mArray = new ArrayList<B();public void A.addB(B tmp){mArray.add(tmp);}}The error message is "[error] The method add(E) in the type ArrayList<E is notapplicable for the arguments (B) mArray.add(tmp)"Compiling with AspectJ Development version (2005/02/18).
SR: The compiler aborts with the following introduction code:aspect introductionToA{private ArrayList<B A.mArray = new ArrayList<B();public void A.addB(B tmp){mArray.add(tmp);}}The error message is "[error] The method add(E) in the type ArrayList<E is notapplicable for the arguments (B) mArray.add(tmp)"Compiling with AspectJ Development version (2005/02/18).
